posts.author: Sucy
posts.content:
Hello, me again! Recently got a new member to join our party. We're going to try a persistent world this time and decided to do Aerlith (unless someone else has a better suggestion). The new group member suggested we roleplay our characters based on the DnD inspired visual novel Goblin Slayer, but we both are still amateurs at DnD and NWN.

The character I will be playing: https://goblin-slayer.fandom.com/wiki/Priestess

His character: https://goblin-slayer.fandom.com/wiki/Goblin_Slayer

I personally have not read the novel myself so if there is any additional information required, I will have to ask him on your behalf as he is Japanese and doesn't speak English.

Thank you for your time!
